text: Peter van Noord (born 3 February 1963) is a Dutch retired basketball player and current coach. He is the head coach of Den Helder Suns since 2017. Van Noord was a member of the Netherlands national basketball team and played with them at the 1986 FIBA World Championship. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Dutch basketball coaches Category:Dutch men's basketball players Category:Leuven Bears coaches Category:Den Helder Suns coaches Category:People from Amstelveen Category:Fresno State Bulldogs men's basketball players Category:Den Helder Kings players Category:Red Giants (basketball club) players Category:Living people
title: Peter van Noord
